greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k>=1} sigma(k)/2^k where sigma(k) is the sum of divisors of k, 1 <= d <= k.
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 354-361.
link: Steven R. Finch, Digital Search Tree Constants [Broken link]
Steven R. Finch, Digital Search Tree Constants [From the Wayback machine]
formula: Faster converging series: Sum_{n >= 1} (1/2)^(n^2) * (n*(4^n - 1) + 2^n)/(2^n - 1)^2. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 19 2021
results.author: Randall L. Rathbun, Jan 16 2002
ext: Name corrected by _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 26 2018
